text: The Kreuzbergpass (; ; Sappada German: KraizpèrkDizionario Sappadino-Italiano: K.) (1636 m) is a high mountain pass between the provinces of South Tyrol and Belluno in Italy. It connects the Puster Valley with Cadore. The pass is also the division line between the Dolomites to the west and the Carnic Alps to the northeast. ==See also== * List of highest paved roads in Europe * List of mountain passes ==References== == External links == * Category:Mountain passes of the Dolomites Category:Mountain passes of Italy Category:Mountain passes of South Tyrol Category:Carnic Alps
title: Kreuzberg Pass
